cards.title: Behemoth
setup: Put {BehemothCharacter} into play, 'Herokiller' side up. Put {HeroTacticsCharacter} into play, 'Standard Protocols' side up. Shuffle all Movement cards and put them face down under this one as the Movement deck.
gameplay: All damage dealt by {BehemothCharacter} is of {BehemothCharacter}'s current damage type.
At the start of the villain turn, if {BehemothCharacter} has less than 30 HP, flip {HeroTacticsCharacter} and {BehemothCharacter}.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Movement deck.
At the end of the villain turn, {BehemothCharacter} deals each hero X damage, where X is the number of proximity tokens on that hero.
cards.advanced: Whenever a hero has 6 proximity tokens, incapacitate that hero.
flippedGameplay: All damage dealt by {BehemothCharacter} is of {BehemothCharacter}'s current damage type.
Whenever {BehemothCharacter} would be dealt damage of his current damage type, redirect that damage to the hero target with the lowest HP.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Movement deck.
At the end of the villain turn, {BehemothCharacter} deals each hero X damage, where X is the number of proximity tokens on that hero.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Whenever a hero has 6 proximity tokens, incapacitate that hero.

cards.title: Hero Tactics
gameplay: At the start of a player's turn, that player may skip the rest of their turn to remove 2 proximity tokens from their hero.

At the end of the environment turn, choose one:{BR}* Each player may move a proximity token from their hero to another active hero.{BR}* One player may move 2 proximity tokens from their hero to the active hero after them in the turn order.{BR}* One player may remove a proximity token from their hero.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the environment turn, choose one:{BR}* Each player may move a proximity token from their hero to another active hero.{BR}* One player may move 2 proximity tokens from their hero to the active hero after them in the turn order.

cards.title: Movement Trash
body: Until subdecks are implemented properly, we need this to mark where Movement cards go after they're used.
This card is indestructible. Cards under this card are not in play.
If you would play a card from the Movement deck but there are none, first shuffle the cards under this one into the Movement deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I’m not going to make any big speeches. Better we get out there and save lives.

cards.title: Proximity
body: This card exists to mark your hero's proximity token pool. It's indestructible as long as you have an active hero.
When you have no non-incapacitated heroes, remove all tokens from this card and remove this card from the game.

cards.title: Continuous Crackle
body: When this card enters play, change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to lightning.
Whenever a hero Ongoing or Equipment card enters play, {BehemothCharacter} deals the associated hero 2 damage.
cards.flavorText: I took off. Again, I tried my armband.{BR}Static. Better than nothing, but not ideal.

cards.title: Discharge
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to energy.
{BehemothCharacter} deals each hero target 2 damage. Each player may move 1 proximity token from their hero to another active hero.

flavorQuotes.text: He's a dynakinetic! He manipulates{BR}energy! No Manton limitation!

cards.title: Earthquake
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to melee.
Destroy all environment cards.{BR}Destroy all Ongoing cards.{BR}Destroy all Equipment cards.
{BehemothCharacter} deals each hero target 2 damage.
cards.flavorText: As far as the eye could see in every{BR}direction, terrain shifted. Hillsides{BR}abruptly tilted, standing structures fell{BR}like collapsing houses of cards.

cards.title: Incinerate
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to fire.
Destroy 2 hero Ongoing cards.
Move 1 proximity token from 1 hero whose card was destroyed this way to another active hero.
cards.flavorText: The man ignited from the{BR}inside out, flame and smoke pouring{BR}from every orifice as he was turned into{BR}a burned-out husk in a matter of{BR}seconds.

cards.title: Juggernaut
body: When this card enters play, change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to sonic.
Reduce damage dealt to {BehemothCharacter} by 1.
Whenever a hero deals damage to {BehemothCharacter}, move a proximity token from another hero to that hero.
cards.flavorText: Forty-five feet tall at the very{BR}least, he climbed forth from{BR}underground. His skin was crusted with{BR}black stone that might have been obsidian.

cards.title: Lightning Bolt
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to lightning.
{BehemothCharacter} deals 1 hero 5 damage. That hero's player may move 1 proximity token from their hero to another active hero.
cards.flavorText: A lightning bolt flashed{BR}from the tip of Behemoth's claw, arcing{BR}around her and striking one of her{BR}subordinates in a single heartbeat, before{BR}leaving only the smell of ozone.

cards.title: Roar
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to Sonic.
{BehemothCharacter} deals each non-villain target 2 damage.
cards.flavorText: The creature roared, and as{BR}invulnerable as she was, it almost hurt.

cards.title: Twisted Wreckage
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to lightning.
Destroy 2 non-character hero cards. Remove 1 of them from the game. Move 1 proximity token from another hero to a hero whose card was destroyed this way.
cards.flavorText: The Endbringer's path of{BR}destruction had continued more or less{BR}in one general direction, but beyond that,{BR}the damage was indiscriminate.

cards.title: Unstoppable Advance
body: When this card enters play, change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to melee.
At the end of the villain turn, move 1 proximity token from another hero to the hero with the most proximity tokens.
cards.flavorText: Cryogenic beams,{BR}containment foam and more served to{BR}slow him down. Not stopping him. No, that{BR}was too much to hope for.

cards.title: Wildfire
body: Change {BehemothCharacter}'s damage type to fire.
{BehemothCharacter} deals each hero with 3 or more proximity tokens {H} damage.
{BehemothCharacter} deals each non-character card hero target {H} damage.
cards.flavorText: When I looked back at the{BR}screen, nearly half of the city was on{BR}fire. Black smoke choked the skies.

cards.title: Advance
body: Each player with an active hero puts a proximity token on their hero.

flavorQuotes.text: Maintain a distance of at least a{BR}hundred feet from Behemoth at the very minimum.

cards.title: A Shift of Attention
body: The player whose hero has the most proximity tokens removes all proximity tokens from their hero.
The player with an active hero 2 turns before them in the turn order puts that many proximity tokens on their hero.
cards.flavorText: This was his new tactic,{BR}burrowing, surfacing. But where was the{BR}retaliation? Their whole damn pattern{BR}centered around repaying us twice over for{BR}any abuse we inflicted on them.

cards.title: Focus
body: The player whose hero has the highest HP puts 1 proximity token on their hero.

flavorQuotes.text: ...Be mindful of line of{BR}sight, because he can and will tag you{BR}with a lightning bolt, and it's not{BR}something you can dodge...

cards.title: Leap
body: The player with the most cards in play puts 2 proximity tokens on their hero.
The players with active heroes immediately before and after that player in the turn order each put 1 proximity token on their hero.
cards.flavorText: With his claws and feet now on{BR}firm ground, he leaped. The shockwave of{BR}his departure toppled the slipshod buildings{BR}around him in his wake.

cards.title: No Safety
body: The player whose active hero has the fewest proximity tokens moves 1 proximity token from each other player's hero to their hero.

flavorQuotes.text: ...Assume every{BR}structure will fall down in a heartbeat,{BR}and know that there's no good place to{BR}hide and wait for this to be over.

cards.title: Shift
body: Each player moves all proximity tokens from their hero to the hero of the player with an active hero immediately to their right.

flavorQuotes.text: ...Get any closer, you probably{BR}won't have a chance of escaping if he{BR}decides to close the gap...
